instructions.name: JumpIfFalse
instructions.description: Jumps to the target address if the register is zero (false).

args.name: target
args.description: Bytecode address(byte offset) to jump to

instructions.name: JumpIf
instructions.description: Jumps to the target address if the register is non-zero (true).

args.name: target
args.description: Bytecode address(byte offset) to jump to

instructions.name: Jump
instructions.description: Unconditionally jumps to the specified bytecode address.

args.name: target
args.description: Bytecode address(byte offset) to jump to

instructions.name: LogicalAnd
instructions.description: Performs logical && on the truthiness of two registers.

args.name: dest
args.description: Register to store the result (0 or 1)

instructions.name: LogicalOr
instructions.description: Performs logical || on the truthiness of two registers.

args.name: dest
args.description: Register to store the result (0 or 1)

instructions.name: LogicalNot
instructions.description: Performs logical negation (!), storing 1 if the input is zero, else 0.

args.name: dest
args.description: Target register to store result (0 or 1)

args.name: source
args.description: Register containing value to logically negate

instructions.name: LogicalXor
instructions.description: Performs logical ^ on the truthiness of two registers.

args.name: dest
args.description: Register to store the result (0 or 1)

instructions.name: AddU8
instructions.description: Adds two u8 registers and stores the result in the destination register.

instructions.name: AddU16
instructions.description: Adds two u16 registers and stores the result in the destination register.

instructions.description: Adds two u32 registers and stores the result in the destination register.

instructions.description: Adds two u64 registers and stores the result in the destination register.

instructions.description: Adds two i8 registers and stores the result in the destination register.

instructions.description: Adds two i16 registers and stores the result in the destination register.

instructions.name: AddI64
instructions.description: Adds two i64 registers and stores the result in the destination register.

instructions.name: AddF32
instructions.description: Adds two f32 floating-point registers and stores the result in the destination register.

instructions.name: AddF64
instructions.description: Adds two f64 floating-point registers and stores the result in the destination register.

instructions.name: DivideU8
instructions.description: Divides one u8 register by another and stores the result.

instructions.name: DivideU16
instructions.description: Divides one u16 register by another and stores the result.

instructions.name: DivideU32
instructions.description: Divides one u32 register by another and stores the result.

instructions.name: DivideU64
instructions.description: Divides one u64 register by another and stores the result.

instructions.name: DivideI8
instructions.description: Divides one i8 register by another and stores the result.

instructions.name: DivideI16
instructions.description: Divides one i16 register by another and stores the result.

instructions.name: DivideI32
instructions.description: Divides one i32 register by another and stores the result.

instructions.name: DivideI64
instructions.description: Divides one i64 register by another and stores the result.

instructions.name: DivideF32
instructions.description: Divides one f32 floating-point register by another and stores the result.

instructions.name: DivideF64
instructions.description: Divides one f64 floating-point register by another and stores the result.

instructions.name: ModuloU8
instructions.description: Computes the remainder of a u8 division. `dest = reg1 % reg2`. Sets error on division by zero.

instructions.name: ModuloU16
instructions.description: Computes the remainder of a u16 division. `dest = reg1 % reg2`. Sets error on division by zero.

instructions.name: ModuloU32
instructions.description: Computes the remainder of a u32 division. `dest = reg1 % reg2`. Sets error on division by zero.

instructions.name: ModuloU64
instructions.description: Computes the remainder of a u64 division. `dest = reg1 % reg2`. Sets error on division by zero.

instructions.name: ModuloI8
instructions.description: Computes the remainder of a i8 division. `dest = reg1 % reg2`. Sets error on division by zero.

instructions.name: ModuloI16
instructions.description: Computes the remainder of a i16 division. `dest = reg1 % reg2`. Sets error on division by zero.

instructions.name: ModuloI32
instructions.description: Computes the remainder of a i32 division. `dest = reg1 % reg2`. Sets error on division by zero.

instructions.name: ModuloI64
instructions.description: Computes the remainder of a i64 division. `dest = reg1 % reg2`. Sets error on division by zero.

instructions.name: ModuloF32
instructions.description: Computes the remainder of a f32 division using `%`. Result is undefined if inputs are NaN or infinite.

instructions.name: ModuloF64
instructions.description: Computes the remainder of a f64 division using `%`. Result is undefined if inputs are NaN or infinite.

instructions.name: EqualU8
instructions.description: Checks equality between two u8 registers. Sets 1 if equal, 0 otherwise.

instructions.name: EqualU16
instructions.description: Checks equality between two u16 registers. Sets 1 if equal, 0 otherwise.

instructions.name: EqualU32
instructions.description: Checks equality between two u32 registers. Sets 1 if equal, 0 otherwise.

instructions.name: EqualU64
instructions.description: Checks equality between two u64 registers. Sets 1 if equal, 0 otherwise.

instructions.name: EqualI8
instructions.description: Checks equality between two i8 registers. Sets 1 if equal, 0 otherwise.

instructions.name: EqualI16
instructions.description: Checks equality between two i16 registers. Sets 1 if equal, 0 otherwise.

instructions.name: EqualI32
instructions.description: Checks equality between two i32 registers. Sets 1 if equal, 0 otherwise.

instructions.name: EqualI64
instructions.description: Checks equality between two i64 registers. Sets 1 if equal, 0 otherwise.

instructions.name: EqualF32
instructions.description: Checks equality between two f32 floating-point registers. Sets 1 if equal, 0 otherwise.

instructions.name: EqualF64
instructions.description: Checks equality between two f64 floating-point registers. Sets 1 if equal, 0 otherwise.

instructions.name: NotEqualU8
instructions.description: Compares two u8 values for inequality. Sets `dest` to 1 if not equal, 0 otherwise.

args.name: dest
args.description: Destination register to store the result (1 or 0)

instructions.name: NotEqualU16
instructions.description: Compares two u16 values for inequality. Sets `dest` to 1 if not equal, 0 otherwise.

args.name: dest
args.description: Destination register to store the result (1 or 0)

instructions.description: Compares two u32 values for inequality. Sets `dest` to 1 if not equal, 0 otherwise.

args.description: Destination register to store the result (1 or 0)

instructions.name: CallFunction
instructions.description: Calls a function at the specified bytecode address. Saves the return address and switches stack frame.

args.name: target
args.description: Bytecode address (offset) to jump to for the function

instructions.name: Return
instructions.description: Returns from the current function by restoring the previous frame and program counter.

instructions.name: Allocate
instructions.description: Allocates a heap section of size from `reg_size` and stores the section index in `reg_target`.

args.name: reg_target
args.description: Register to store the section index

args.name: reg_size
args.description: Register containing the allocation size in bytes

instructions.name: Deallocate
instructions.description: Frees the heap section at the index given in `reg_target`.

args.name: reg_target
args.description: Register containing the section index to free

instructions.name: Memcpy
instructions.description: Copies memory from a source heap section to a destination heap section.

instructions.name: MemSet
instructions.description: Fills a heap section with a repeated byte value.

args.name: reg_ptr
args.description: Register with section index to fill

args.name: reg_value
args.description: Register with byte value to fill (only lowest 8 bits used)

args.name: reg_size
args.description: Register with number of bytes to fill

instructions.name: Halt
instructions.description: Halts execution of the virtual machine immediately.

instructions.name: MoveU8
instructions.description: Moves a u8 value from one register to another. `dest = source`.

instructions.name: MoveU16
instructions.description: Moves a u16 value from one register to another. `dest = source`.

instructions.name: MoveU32
instructions.description: Moves a u32 value from one register to another. `dest = source`.

instructions.name: MoveU64
instructions.description: Moves a u64 value from one register to another. `dest = source`.

instructions.name: MoveI8
instructions.description: Moves a i8 value from one register to another. `dest = source`.

instructions.name: MoveI16
instructions.description: Moves a i16 value from one register to another. `dest = source`.

instructions.name: MoveI32
instructions.description: Moves a i32 value from one register to another. `dest = source`.

instructions.name: MoveI64
instructions.description: Moves a i64 value from one register to another. `dest = source`.

instructions.name: MoveF32
instructions.description: Moves a f32 value from one register to another. `dest = source`.

instructions.name: MoveF64
instructions.description: Moves a f64 value from one register to another. `dest = source`.

instructions.description: Adds an immediate u8 value to the destination register.

args.description: Immediate value to add to the register

instructions.name: ShiftLeftU8
instructions.description: Performs left bit shift on a u8 value from `val_reg` by amount in `shift_reg`, storing result in `dest`.

args.name: dest
args.description: Destination register for the shifted result

args.name: val_reg
args.description: Register containing the value to shift

args.name: val_reg
args.description: Register containing the value to shift

instructions.name: Print
instructions.description: Prints a UTF-8 string from memory to standard output. Reads `length` bytes from `section_id` starting at `offset`, decodes as UTF-8, and prints the resulting string.

args.name: reg_section_id
args.description: Register containing the heap section index

args.name: reg_offset
args.description: Register containing the byte offset into the section

args.name: reg_length
args.description: Register containing the number of bytes to read

instructions.name: StoreConstantArray
instructions.description: Copies a constant array (identified by `const_id`) into a newly allocated heap section, storing the section index in `reg_ptr`.

args.name: reg_ptr
args.description: Register to store the resulting section index

args.name: const_id
args.description: Identifier of the constant array to store

instructions.name: DebugPrintU8
instructions.description: Prints the value of a u8 register to stdout for debugging.

instructions.name: DebugPrintU16
instructions.description: Prints the value of a u16 register to stdout for debugging.

instructions.name: DebugPrintU32
instructions.description: Prints the value of a u32 register to stdout for debugging.

instructions.name: DebugPrintU64
instructions.description: Prints the value of a u64 register to stdout for debugging.

instructions.name: DebugPrintI8
instructions.description: Prints the value of a i8 register to stdout for debugging.

instructions.name: DebugPrintI16
instructions.description: Prints the value of a i16 register to stdout for debugging.

instructions.name: DebugPrintI32
instructions.description: Prints the value of a i32 register to stdout for debugging.

instructions.name: DebugPrintI64
instructions.description: Prints the value of a i64 register to stdout for debugging.

instructions.name: DebugPrintF32
instructions.description: Prints the value of a f32 register to stdout for debugging.

instructions.name: DebugPrintF64
instructions.description: Prints the value of a f64 register to stdout for debugging.

instructions.name: DebugPrintRaw
instructions.description: Prints the raw 64-bit value of a register in hexadecimal for debugging.

args.name: reg
args.description: Register to inspect as raw bits
